expo.name: Master24.kz

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses access to your camera to let you take pictures to post to your orders or set as avatar
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses access to images library to let you choose avatar or pictures for orders from existing images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to find current location of user and put it in map as address
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires your location so that we can show you can put as address your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app requires your location so that we can show you can put as address your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: This app requires your location so that we can show you can put as address your current location
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.

expo.description:
Наймите лучших специалистов! 
Master24 – биржа специалистов Казахстана!
